price: Bersabarlah atas segala apa yang mereka katakan dan ingatlah hamba Kami Dāwūd yang mempunyai kekuatan; sesungguhnya dia amat taat (kepada Tuhan).
arabic: ٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱذۡكُرۡ عَبۡدَنَا دَاوُۥدَ ذَا ٱلۡأَيۡدِۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: iṣ'bir ʿalā mā yaqūlūna wa-udh'kur ʿabdanā dāwūda dhā al-aydi innahu awwābun
